pkgmetadata.longdescription: Interactive Self-Organizing Maps // Self-organizing maps (also known as SOM, see Kohonen (2001) doi:10.1007/978-3-642-56927-2) are a method for dimensionality reduction and clustering of continuous data. This package introduces interactive (html) graphics for easier analysis of SOM results. It also features an interactive interface, for push-button training and visualization of SOM, as well as tools to evaluate the quality of SOM.
